subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
BCSDN cooperates with the following European/international networks: CIVICUS (incl. AGNA), ECAS, CONCORD, ENNA, CEECN, APRODEV, ALDA, TrustLaw, TRIALOG, TSI, Global Standard for CSO Accountability.  
BCSDN member organizations are members of national civil society platforms.
relevant_communication: Monitoring Matrix on Enabling Environment for Civil Society Development: www.monitoringmatrix.net
